channel.title: Can someone run through safe zones?
channel.description: If you can please post here, Trying to make a server. But can't adjust safe zones. So confused :confused: Thanks! [ If You Help ] X[)

They download it because it has some commands that gives them Santa hats, full spec’s OMG, custom sprites OGNRNHGNS!11!, fast training and last but definatly not least-‘full’ Mining!

Get the picture?

item.title: Can someone run through safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Well it’s different for different sources, but here’s what I have just so you know it is there in some sources:

public boolean inSafezone() { if((absX >=2708 && absX <=2816 && absY >=3149 && absY <=3235 ) || (absX >=2800 && absX <=2820 && absY >=3330 && absY <=3334 ) || (absX >=3633 && absX <=3715 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3550 ) || (absX >=2600 && absX <=2750 && absY >=9300 && absY <=9600 ) || (absX >=3225 && absX <=3228 && absY >=2840 && absY <=2843 ) || (absX >=3150 && absX <=3192 && absY >=2958 && absY <=2999 ) || (absX >=2844 && absX <=2865 && absY >=3329 && absY <=3332 ) || (absX >=2638 && absX <=2661 && absY >=3353 && absY <=3381 ) || (absX >=2824 && absX <=2843 && absY >=3329 && absY <=3337 ) || (absX >=2579 && absX <=2634 && absY >=3393 && absY <=3447 ) || (absX >=2688 && absX <=2718 && absY >=3456 && absY <=3468 ) || (absX >=2869 && absX <=2878 && absY >=3332 && absY <=3341 ) || (absX >=2806 && absX <=2868 && absY >=3333 && absY <=3368 ) || (absX >=3091 && absX <=3098 && absY >=3489 && absY <=3499 ) || (absX >=3464 && absX <=3510 && absY >=9480 && absY <=9519 ) || (absX >=2438 && absX <=2447 && absY >=3082 && absY <=3098 ) || (absX >=2502 && absX <=2522 && absY >=3844 && absY <=3876 ) || (absX >=2567 && absX <=2585 && absY >=3842 && absY <=3859 ) || (absX >=2577 && absX <=2635 && absY >=3835 && absY <=3910 ) || (absX >=3545 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3267 && absY <=3308 ) || (absX >=2812 && absX <=2867 && absY >=3230 && absY <=3310 ) || (absX >= 2578 && absX <=2609 && absY >=3150 && absY <=3175 ) || (absX >=2630 && absX <=2680 && absY >=2630 && absY <=2690 ) || (absX >=2705 && absX <=2735 && absY >=9800 && absY <=9832 ) || (absX >=2528 && absX <=2548 && absY >=4710 && absY <=4725 ) || (absX >=2370 && absX <=2420 && absY >=5125 && absY <=6169 ) || (absX >=3021 && absX <=3057 && absY >=4816 && absY <=4850 ) || (absX >=2508 && absX <=2540 && absY >=4627 && absY <=4670 )) return true; else return false; }

And where the hells your server Brendan? I believe i’ve had over 1500 downloads of my server. Might be for a reason huh?

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone run through safe zones?

item.title: Can someone run through safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

He uses Satan’s Isle (Mod Adam) because he can’t make a decent server himself. Here, this is a tutorial I made a while ago;

Purpose : To make safezones in Pimpscape and all it’s children, Phonescape etc.

Difficulty : 2/10

Procedure
Step 1 : [i] First of all we need to find the boolean. Search for this in client.java public boolean nonWild

[i]You should see something like this below that if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )||(absX >=3156 && absX <=3277 && absY >=3374 && absY <=3514 )||(absX >=3456 && absX <=3582 && absY >=3249 && absY <=3327 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Step 2 : [i] Now that you’ve found the boolean, we can add the safezone! This is the format you use when making one (absX >= [X Coords here SW] && absX <= [X Coords here NE] && absY >= [Y Coords here SW] && absY <=[Y Coords here NE] ) ||

Step 3 : Save client.java and compile, congratulations on just making a safezone!

Credits : Me and n0vamage

Additional Information : [i] If you didn’t understand step 2, then pay attention!

The way safezones work is… You work out the most SW (South-Western) coords of the area you wan’t to make a safezone and add the X coords in the 1st place, put the Y coords of them in the last one. For the NE (North-Eastern) part of the safezone, you add the X coords of the position in the 2nd place and the 2nd last place.[/i]

Example : Say this square is you’re area that you wan’t to make a safezone.
__________
| | < NE Corner
| |
| |
| |
SW Corner >|________|

You’re adding in the SW corner’s coords and the NE coords so that the ‘safezone box’ can stretch out and cover the full area. Hope you understand now. :rolleyes:

Moderators : You’ll find a tutorial on adding safezones in this section somewhere, there isn’t one for Pimpscape though, only for Testscape and the Testscape tutorial isn’t compatable with Pimpscape so, please think about all the people this might help before attempting to lock it. Please, I’m here to help and help I shall.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone run through safe zones?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Search for:

boolean insafezone

Here’s the layout:

X111, X222, Y111, Y222

X1 = Southwestern corner Coordinate
Y1 = Southwestern corner Coordinate
X2 = Northeastern corner Coordinate
Y2 = Northeastern corner Coordinate
